resourceGroupName: <resource group name to create or supply name of existing one>
resourceGroupLocation: <region to create resources i.e East US2
azstoragename: <ADLS storage that will be used by Synapse workspace>
firewallrulename: <name for firewall rule to enable this IP to connect to Synapse workspace>
azstoragename2: <name for main ADLS to house data>
containername2: <name for container to land parquet files>
LinkedServiceName1: <Linked Service name pointing to azstoragename2 above>
LinkedServiceName2: <Linked Service name pointing to akvname above>
LinkedServiceName3: <Linked Service name pointing to storage account containing csv source>
DatasetName2: <Dataset name for ADLS to compile data in parquet files in azstoragename2>
